post.title: First Post using Miniblog.Core
post.excerpt: This is my first blog post using Miniblog.Core developed by Mads Kristensen.
post.content:
This is my first post using Miniblog.Core developed by Mads Kristensen. I migrated over from Ghost because I wanted more simple upgrade experience. Given that I host my blog on Microsoft Azure and I am a .NET developer, I will be able to make updates as often and as rapidly as I desire or at least as Microsoft upgrades Azure itself.

Even more importantly, the integration with Open Live Writer is a huge plus because I can compose blog posts with layout and images using a familiar editor and retain those blog posts locally.
